title: "Credit Data"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
# Packages ----
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
```

```{r data}
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "data/credit")
credit_data <- tbl(con, "credit")
```

## Data Exploration
```{r}
colnames(credit_data)
```


```{r}
credit_data %>% 
  count(risk)
```

```{r}
credit_data %>% 
  count(purpose, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
credit_data %>% 
  group_by(purpose) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(),
            p_good = mean(risk == "good"),
            mean_amt = mean(credit_amount)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```


```{r}
credit_data %>% 
  collect() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = risk, y = credit_amount)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
credit_data %>% 
  count(housing, risk)
```

```{r}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
